entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Whistler
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whistler 12:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: -9.0°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
